- What does this PR change?
- Why is it needed?

- [ ] Other

## Screenshots / screen recordings (optional)

## Checklist

- [ ] I tested this in a real WordPress environment
- [ ] I ran `composer phpcs` (or explain why not)
- [ ] If I changed JS/CSS, I ran `npm run build` and committed updated minified files
- [ ] I added/updated docs if behavior changed
- [ ] I added relevant notes to `.github/skills/SKILL.md` if this fixes a recurring pitfall

## Notes for reviewers

- Any edge cases?
- Any backward compatibility concerns?
- Any performance concerns?
